title: CalcGREEN 2 : Ch. 2.3 : Differential Operators & Linear ODEs

media:group.media:title: CalcGREEN 2 : Ch. 2.3 : Differential Operators & Linear ODEs
media:group.media:description: Our strategy for solving linear differential equations in a principled manner will focus on the algebra of differential operators. This is a very useful & general approach.
